entities.name: barty

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as a person who is serving tea to Mr. Crouch and the others. He is referred to by his first name, indicating that he is an individual.

entities.name: bulgarians

entities.name: ludo

relationships.description: Mr. Crouch is speaking to Bagman, as indicated by the conversation between them.
